Title: Doctor Sleep
Writer: Mike Flanagan (screenplay by), Stephen King (based upon the novel by)
Actors: Ewan McGregor, Rebecca Ferguson, Kyliegh Curran, Cliff Curtis
Plot: Years following the events of The Shining (1980), a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal.
Production: Intrepid Pictures, Warner Bros., Vertigo Entertainment
